Title: Imminent Risk
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Ron Nyswaner
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Elizabeth Marvel, F. Murray Abraham
Plot: Carrie gets bad news. Saul makes a plan. Quinn accepts his situation.
